Header: Geoffrey Van Ordenmeets TNA Leader R. Sampanthan
Content: A meeting was held in Colombo between the Member of the EU â€“ Sri Lanka Friendship Group in the European Parliament Geoffrey Van Orden and TNA Leader, R. Sampanthan. The TNA says that the current political situation was discussed in the meeting. Sampanthan stated that he took the decision to support the government as a policy decision at a time when there was no Prime Minister or a Government. It was also stated in the meeting that before the 4th of February, the report of the Expert Committee on the new constitution would be presented.
